feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling asset validation flow, overlays, and final scene rendering with controls.
frontend/src/components/AssetScanResults: Overlay showing validated asset list with refresh, rebuild, and continue actions.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhou: Displays a large faint WHY STOP logo silhouette centered behind all content.
Centered hub logo with forced remounting for asset rebinding and a subtle halo ring.
frontend/src/components/MissingAssetOver: Blocking overlay indicating a missing asset and offering refresh or rebuild actions.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSyncContr: Floating popover providing refresh, rebuild, and slug‑validated publish controls.
frontend/src/components/TheatreStageScen: Renders the full cinematic theatre scene with curtains, seating, walkway, and lighting effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity state, login/logout helpers, and AuthClient setup via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing; reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequiredAssets.ts: Checks required asset files for presence and validity, returning missing assets and refresh capability.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/logoAssetFilenames.ts: Exports the single canonical logo filename for the project.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeKnownAssetIm: Normalizes img src attributes for required assets by removing leading slashes and re-running checks on startup.
frontend/src/utils/publishSlug.ts: Provides slug sanitization, validation, and default slug generation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/requiredAssetFilename: Exports the list of required image asset filenames and related type.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and dark mode settings.
project_state.json: Defines STEP 1 build requirements for a theatre‑scene UI with strict asset filename enforcement, mandatory rescan/refresh flows, and fail‑loud missing‑asset overlays. Documents architectural constraints, known issues with paths/domain, and legacy feature definitions.
